name: Garthmania Multiple Choice Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of Garth Brooks' First CD?
What University did Garth Brooks Attend?
What was his major in College?
questions.explanation:
Marketing.

	He must have learned a lot, he is a master of Marketing.

questions.text: What was the name of Garth's first Christmas Album?
options: I got an Ego for Christmas

questions.text: What is the name of Garth's alter ego?
Which of the following is not a Garth Brooks CD?
In the Song, Much too young (to feel this damn old), what artist is mentioned in the lyrics?
questions.explanation:
Chris Ledoux.

	'Worn out tape of Chris Ledoux, lonely woman and bad booze' is the line.

questions.text: What Patsy Cline song did Garth Brooks' Remake?
questions.explanation:
Walking after Midnight.

	Walking after Midnight is on the 'Chase' Album.

questions.text: What group originally recorded his song 'Fever'?
questions.explanation:
Aerosmith.

	Aerosmith did the same song, but Garth changed some of the lyrics.
